casebody.data:
Russell JORDAN et al.
v.
Jon D. BILLER et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 7, 2018

Karen L. Dowd, in support of the petition.

David S. Doyle, in opposition.

The defendants' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 184 Conn. App. 848, --- A.3d ---- (2018), is denied.
